data.text:
Xweave:
- Raised: $3.00M | Stage: Seed | Has token: No
- Investors: Jungle Ventures and 6 others
- Description: Singapore-based fintech platform for real-time, compliant cross-border payments via a blockchain-powered, non-custodial infrastructure integrating fiat and stablecoin networks.
- Website: https://t.co/QQ1C3CHLMy

AppLayer $APPL:
- Raised: N/A | Stage: Undisclosed | Has token: No
- Investors: Arcanum Ventures
- Description: Modular blockchain platform featuring a Blockchain Development Kit, EVM-compatible network, and cross-chain interoperability for building and connecting app-specific chains.
- Twitter: @AppLayerLabs

BVNK:
- Raised: N/A | Stage: Strategic | Has token: No
- Investors: Visa
- Description: Banking and payments platform for crypto-native businesses, enabling fiat and crypto payments, multi-currency asset holding, and global transfers via a developer-friendly API.
- Twitter: @BVNKFinance

CodeAnt AI
- Raised: $2.00M | Stage: Seed | Has token: No
- Investors: Y Combinator and 5 others
- Description: AI-powered code review platform that automates detection of code quality issues and security vulnerabilities, integrates with IDEs and CI/CD, and supports 30+ languages to cut review time and bugs by 50%.
- Twitter: @CodeAntAI
If you own any doodles, think I minted a few from Zora and Layer3 quests, $DOOD airdrop

Provide a report about the business/project with valuable insights for the future, SWAT/competitor analysis, etc: reward 0.

Be a influencer/kol and share a tweet about the business/project. reward $$$$.

Lesson? Doesn't matter, just get payed upfront xD

Fuze
- Raised: $12.20M | Stage: Series A | Has token: No
- Investors: Galaxy and 2 others
- Description: Fuze offers a white-label platform that enables banks, fintechs, and enterprises to launch regulated digital asset products like stablecoins, CBDCs, and tokenized assets without managing blockchain or compliance complexities.
- Twitter: @fuzefinance

ORBITGRIFT
- Raised: N/A | Stage: Incubation | Has token: Yes
- Investors: Alliance DAO
- Description: ORBITGRIFT is a DeFi AI agent on Solana offering token swaps, bridging, staking, lending, and portfolio management, with the ORBIT token actively traded and supporting its utility ecosystem.

Sentora
- Raised: $25.00M | Stage: Undisclosed | Has token: No
- Investors: New Form Capital and 6 others
- Description: Sentora is an institutional-grade DeFi platform offering yield strategies, risk management, compliance tools, and structured products, merging IntoTheBlock’s analytics with Trident’s financial structuring expertise.
- Website: https://t.co/vaEsV0HaW0

Litheum
- Raised: $750.00K | Stage: Strategic | Has token: No
- Investors: Amber Group and 1 other
- Description: Litheum is a layer1 blockchain using a unique Proof of Performance consensus to enable microtransactions and large-scale AI agent operations, with low fees, fast processing, and EVM compatibility for DeFi and AI-focused dApps.
- Twitter handle: @LitheumOfficial
